name: Bird Flight: Rescue the Eggs
description:
A short game made for the Brackeys 2021 game jam! Follow our little bird friend as they try to collect their eggs and bring them back to their nest. Without thier eggs, they cannot fly, so they'll need to get them back to be stronger and regain their ability to fly.

Movement: Move with A and D or the LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys. W, or the UP arrow glides and S and the DOWN arrow dives. ESC for the pause screen.
